name: pns-cars/faq
title: FAQ
description: FAQ section with questions and answers

default.question: What documents do I need?
default.answer: You need a valid driver's license, proof of address, and an active account with a rideshare or delivery platform.

default.question: Is insurance included?
default.answer: Yes, we provide the necessary commercial insurance required for rideshare driving.

default.question: How do payments work?
default.answer: Payments are made weekly via card. A refundable deposit is required at signing.
